SA15n1256:5: iha khalu sakalajaḍapadārtharāśau pratyākhyāte nirākṛte ca nirākāravijñānavāde pratihate cālīkākārayogini pāramārthikaprakāśamātre samyagunmūlite ca sākāravijñānālīkatvasamārope pratisantānaṃ ca svapnavadabādhitadehabhogapratiṣṭhādyākāraprakāśamātrātmake jagati vyavasthite yasya yadā yāvadākāracakrapratibhāsaṃ yadvijñānaṃ parisphurati tasya tadā tāvadākāracakraparikaritaṃ tadvijñānaṃ citrādvaitamiti sthitiḥ |
SA15n1256:7: atra ca vipratipattirnāma kiṃ citratāyāmadvaite vijñānatve sarvatraiveti vikalpāḥ ||
SA15n1256:10: anyathā śaśaviṣāṇādāviva jaḍamidamalīkaṃ vijñānaṃ veti vipratipattīnāmanavakāśaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1256:16: tasmāccitrateyamadvaitavirodhinīti vyāmohādekatva eva vipratiprattiriti tatra prasādhanaṃ sādhanamidamucyate ||
SA15n1256:23: vicitrākāramadhyavartini nīlākāre dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi prakāśamānatālakṣaṇasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭatvāt |
SA15n1256:24: nanu caikatve sādhye yadaparamekatvādhikaraṇaṃ tadiha dṛṣṭāntīkartumucitam |
SA15n1256:28: tataśca yathā citritākāracakrasyākārabhedato bhedastathā nīlākārasyāpi deśabhedato bhedaḥ |
SA15n1256:29: tadayaṃ sādhyaśūnyo dṛṣṭānto hetuśca vipakṣe paridṛśyamāno yadi tatraiva niyatastadā viruddhaḥ ||
SA15n1256:32: yadi deśabhedato vijñānātmakasthūlanīlākārasya bhedastadāsya pratiparamāṇudeśabhede bhedasaṃbhavātu paramāṇupracayamātrātmako vijñānātmakasthūlanīlākāraḥ syāt |
SA15n1256:34: tmakanīlaparamāṇūnāṃ svasvarūpanimagnatvena saṃtamasanimagnānekapuruṣavat vyativedanābhāvāt sthūlanīlākhaṇḍalakapratibhāsābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ syāt,
SA15n1256:36: na caivaṃ vaktavyam paramāṇūnāṃ svarūpanimagnatve'pyekopādānatayā puñjātmaiva sthūlaḥ sthūlamātmānaṃ jñāsyatīti,
SA15n1256:37: satyapyekopādānatve svasvarūpanimagnatvādeva sthūlavyavasthāpakasya bhinnasyātmano'nyonyaṃ vā grāhyagrāhakabhāvasyāyogāt |
SA15n1256:41: na ca yathā bāhyārthavāde sthūlaikākārajñānapratibhāsa eva bāhyaparamāṇupracayapratibhāsavyavasthā gatyantarābhāvāt,
SA15n1256:45: tasmād yāvad yāvat pratibhāsastāvattāvat sthūlatayaiva vyāptaḥ |
SA15n1256:46: asthūle paramāṇau sthūlanivṛttimātre ca pratibhāsasya dṛśyānupalambhabādhitatvāt |
SA15n1256:47: yathā prasiddhānumāne sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaṃ kramākramakāritvenāpi,
SA15n1256:48: kṣaṇikatvābhāvācca karmākramanivṛttau nivartamānaṃ kṣaṇikatve niyataṃ sidhyati,
SA15n1256:50: ekatvābhāvācca vipakṣāt paramāṇupuñjātmana ekatvanivṛttimātrātmanaśca svaviruddhopalambhāt sthaulyasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivartamānamekatvaṃ niyataṃ sidhyati |
SA15n1256:51: tataśca yathā bahirvyāptipakṣe ghaṭe dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalāt sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvaniyatamavadhārya sattvāt pakṣe kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ, ta(thā)
SA15n1256:52: trāpi nīlākāre dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalādeva prakāśamānatvamekatvaniyatamavagamya prakāśamānatvād vicitrākāracakre sādhyadharmiṇyekatvasiddhiriti na dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyaśūnyatvam |
SA15n1256:56: tasmācca vipakṣāddhetuvyatirekapratipattyavasare kiṃ vipakṣātmā prakāśate na vā |
SA15n1256:61: atrocyate | iha dvividho vijñānānāṃ viṣayaḥ grāhyo'dhyavaseyaśca |
SA15n1256:67: pratibhāse ca deśakālasvabhāvāntaritasakalavipakṣa sākṣātkāre sādhyātmāpi varākaḥ sutarāṃ pratīyata ityanumānavaiyarthyam |
SA15n1256:70: yadi punarasyādhyavasāyo'pi na syāttadā vyatireko na niścīyata iti yuktam,
SA15n1256:72: nanvasmanmate vastvavastvātmakasakalavipakṣapratipattisaṃbhavāt tato hetuvyatirekaḥ saṃpratyetuṃ śakyata eva |
SA15n1256:79: tathā hi dhūmādiravahnyādervipakṣād vyāvṛtto vahnyādiniyataḥ sidhyati,
SA15n1256:80: tasya ca vastvavastvātmakasakalavipakṣapadārtharāśeḥ svarūpanirbhāsa iti kiṃ nirvikalpakajñāne kalpanāyāṃ vā |
SA15n1256:83: kiṃ nirākāre jñāne sakalavipakṣādisvarūpasya sākṣāt sphuraṇam,
SA15n1256:88: deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭānāṃ padārthānāmarvācīne jane nirākāre ca jñāne sphuraṇāyogādityasyārthasya śāstre eva vistareṇa prasādhanāt |
SA15n1256:99: san vā na kaścit khyātīti vivakṣitam |
SA15n1256:100: tatra yasya padārthasya svarūpaparinirbhāsaḥ sa kathamasanniti prāṇadhāribhirabhidhātavyaḥ |
SA15n1256:101: sphurataḥ keśoṇḍukākārasya bāhyarūpatayā bādhyatve'pi jñānarūpatayārthatvasya ācāryeṇa pratipāditatvāt grāhakābhimatanirākāraprakāśasyāpyasattvābhidhānaprasaṅgāt ||
SA15n1256:105: yadyekatra svarūpasākṣātkāriṇi pratyakṣe'viśvāsaḥ kathamanyatra bādhake svarūpāntaraprakāśa eva nirvṛttistatpūrvakamanumānaṃ ca sutarāmaviśvāsabhājanamiti na bādhakavārtāpi |
SA15n1256:118: etena bhāsamāno vā ākāro'sanniti dvitīyo'pi pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ,
SA15n1256:120: tathā san vā kaścinna khyātīti tṛtīyasaṅkalpo'pi vyākulaḥ,
SA15n1256:123: nanu prakāśo nāmaḥ vastunaḥ sattāsādhakaṃ pramāṇam |
SA15n1256:130: sarvathā bahirabhāve tu jñānasya prakāśāvyabhicārāttāvataiva sattve kimarthakriyayā |
SA15n1256:132: nārthakriyāpi sarvasmai kvacicced bhāsanaṃ na kim ||
SA15n1256:133: iti | nirvikalpe tāvat svasaṃvedanasiddhasvākāramantareṇa vipakṣādayo na parisphuranti |
SA15n1256:134: athāmī vikalpe pratibhāsanta iti dvitīyaḥ saṅkalpo'bhyupagamyate,
SA15n1256:135: asminnapi pakṣe pratibhāsamāna ākāro'sādhāraṇo'śabdasaṃsṛṣṭatayā svasaṃvedanatādātmye praviṣṭatvādvastusanneva |
SA15n1256:137: tadāpi teṣāṃ svarūpasya nirbhāso'sti na vā |
SA15n1256:141: uktam | tasya cetarapratyakṣeṣviva vikalpe'pi svīkāre viruddhavyāptopalambhena vikalpabhrāntatvayordūramapāstatvādvikalpe'pi tvanmate pratyakṣatvamakṣatam |
SA15n1256:146: atha vipakṣādirartho'smin prakāśata iti vācā svarūpasākṣātkāritvaṃ kathitamiti mātā me bandhyeti vṛttāntaḥ |
SA15n1256:147: iṣyate ca tvayā vipakṣādisvarūpasākṣātkāritvaṃ bikalpasyeti pratyakṣatānatikramaḥ,
SA15n1256:149: tataśca tatpratibhāsino'pi rūpasya sata eva khyātirnāsatkhyātiḥ |
SA15n1256:150: na ca tadeva vikalpe parisphuradrūpamasatāmīśvarādīnāṃ svarūpam,
SA15n1256:159: yadi nādhyakṣatā tasya rūpanirbhāsa eva na |
SA15n1256:161: yadi tu pratibhāseta rūpamasya sadeva tat |
SA15n1256:182: bāhye tu adhyavaseye adhyavasāya iti cet |
SA15n1256:189: tathā hi jñānaṃ kenacidākāreṇa satyenālīkena vopajātaṃ nāma |
SA15n1256:191: tatkṛtatve na tāvat tatkāla eva vyāpārāntaramanubhūyata iti kutastadāropaḥ |
SA15n1256:192: kālāntare ca svayamevāsat kasya vyāpāraḥ syāt |
SA15n1256:193: dvitīyapakṣe jñānāntaramapi nākārāroparāgasaṅginīmutpattimantareṇa vyāpārāntareṇa kvacit kiñcitkaraṃ nāma |
SA15n1256:198: tatra buddhau yadi svarūpeṇa sphurati satyapratītirevāsau, ka āropaḥ |
SA15n1256:199: atha na parisphurati tathāpi ka āropaḥ |
SA15n1256:204: na hi marīcisphuraṇameva jalasphuraṇamiti na svākāre bāhyāropaḥ |
SA15n1256:224: bhedena pratītiniṣedhamātre'pi na bāhyasya pratītirukteti kutastadadhyavasāyaḥ |
SA15n1256:225: yadi hi bāhyaṃ prakāśeta ekatvenānekatvena vā satā asatā vā pratītiriti yuktam |
SA15n1256:230: niraṃśatvādvastunaḥ sarvātmanā pratibhāso'pratibhāso veti śāstramevātra vistareṇa parīkṣyate |
SA15n1256:232: tathā hi kiṃ bāhye gṛhyamāṇe'gṛhyamāṇe vā |
SA15n1256:236: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye pravṛttiniyamo na syāt,
SA15n1256:246: na hi nīlaṃ pītaṃ śakyaṃ grahītuṃ kartuṃ vā śilpakuśalenāpi |
SA15n1256:254: na hi kṣaṇikaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ kramavantau grahaṇasamāropau kartumarhati |
SA15n1256:255: uttarasmiṃstu kalpe'vikalpasvasaṃvedanapratyakṣādvikalpākārādahaṅkārāspadādanahaṅkārāspadaḥ samāropyamāṇo vikalpena svagocaro na śakyo'bhinnaḥ pratipattum |
SA15n1256:273: na tvātmā vedyamānaḥ samāropito nārthaḥ samāropyamāṇaḥ pratyakṣavedyaḥ |
SA15n1256:274: sa ca samāropaḥ sato'sato vā grahaṇameva |
SA15n1256:276: svapratibhāsasya bāhyādbhedāgraho bāhyasamāropastato bāhye vṛttiriti cet |
SA15n1256:277: sa kiṃ gṛhyamāṇe bāhye na vā |
SA15n1256:280: agṛhyamāṇe tu bhedāgrahe na pravṛttiniyamaḥ syāt,
SA15n1256:282: tasmād yathā yathāyamadhyavasāyaścintyate tathā tathā viśīryata eva |
SA15n1256:283: tathā vikalpāropābhimānagrahaniścayādayo'pyadhyavasāyavat svākāraparyavasitā eva sphuranto bāhyasya vārtāmātramapi na jānantītyadhyavasāyasvabhāvā eva śabdapravṛttimittabhede'pi tatkathaṃ yuktyāgamabahirbhūto'nātmasphuraṇamācakṣīta |
SA15n1256:285: vikalpa ityadhyavasāyaityāropa ityabhimāna iti graha iti niścaya ityādikaṃ śāstre pratipadaṃ pratipāditam,
SA15n1256:288: tathā hi savareva prakārairaviparītasvarūpasaṃvedanād bhrānteratyantamabhāvaḥ syāt |
SA15n1256:293: prakāśamāno vā kathamasau tasyāṃ na prakāśate |
SA15n1256:298: nityaḥ śabda iti sarvātmanā ca niścayaḥ syāt |
SA15n1256:299: gauriti spaṣṭena ca svena lakṣaṇena prakāśeta |
SA15n1256:300: svalakṣaṇe ca saṅketāyogāt vikalpikaiva sā buddhirna syāt |
SA15n1256:301: tasmādaśeṣagovyaktisādhāraṇena gotvena gobuddhiralīkena sābhilāpena viplavāt prakhyātīti tathā prakāśanamasyā gavārthāvasāya ityeṣṭavyam |
SA15n1256:308: tathā hi kā punariyaṃ bhrāntirasatkhyātiratasmiṃstadgraho vā yadabhāvādidānīmeva muktirāsajyate |
SA15n1256:312: yasya svarūpanirbhāso bādhakād yadi tanna sat |
SA15n1256:318: nānyā va bhāvinītyatra pramāṇaṃ kiñcidasti vaḥ |
SA15n1256:322: śāstre ca atasmiṃstadgrahāt svapratibhāse'narthe'rthādhyavasāyād dṛśyavikalpyayorekīkaraṇād bhrāntiruktā |
SA15n1256:323: tāmayaṃ samarthayitumasamarthaḥ svātantryeṇālīkasphuraṇaṃ bhrāntiriti kāvyaṃ viracayya vistārayati ||
SA15n1256:324: nanvatasmiṃstadgraho'pi bhramaḥ svākāraparyavasitajñānādatirikto bahubhirbahudhā vicāryaṃ pratyākhyātaḥ |
SA15n1256:325: tat kathaṃ tasminnapi pakṣe na bhrāntikṣatiryenedānīmeva muktiprasaṅgo na syāditi cet |
SA15n1256:331: ayameva ca saṃsārastatkṣayo mokṣa iti kvedānīmeva tadvārtā'pi |
SA15n1256:332: tathā hi vicitrānādivāsanāvaśāt prabodhakapratyayaviśeṣāpekṣayā vikalpaḥ kenacidākāreṇopajāyamāna eva bahirmukhapravṛttyanukūlamarthakriyāsmaraṇābhilāṣādiprabandhamādhatte |
SA15n1256:337: yathā candrādijñānasya bhrāntasyābhrāntasya vā taddarśanāvasāyajananameva grahaṇavyāpāraḥ |
SA15n1256:342: nanu tathā ca tacca tena pratipādyate na ca tajjñāne tat prakāśata iti śapathenāpi na saṃpratyaya iti cet |
SA15n1256:344: na hyadhyavasāyād bāhyasya paṭādervastuno bādhakāvatārāt pūrvasandigdhavastubhāvasya kṣaṇikāderavastuno vā śaśaviṣāṇāderasphuraṇe'pi siddhipratibandho brahmaṇāpi pratividhātuṃ śakyaḥ |
SA15n1256:349: tataśca tena ca tat pratipādyate na ca jñāne tatprakāśa iti saṅgatirastyeva,
SA15n1256:351: nanu yadi nādhyavaseyapratītistadā'gṛhīte'pi svalakṣaṇādau pravṛttiriti sarvatrāviśeṣeṇa prasajyeta,
SA15n1256:362: tathehāpi hutavahākārasya vikalpasya dāhapākādyarthakriyārthinastatsmaraṇavato hutavahaviṣayāyāmeva pravṛttau sāmarthyaṃ pramāṇapratītaṃ kathamatiprasaṅgabhāgi |
SA15n1256:365: nanu ca sādṛśyāropeṇa kiṃ svākārasya bāhye svākāre vā bāhyasyāropaḥ |
SA15n1256:369: kiṃ tarhi, svavāsanāparipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva sā buddhirapaśyantyapi bāhayaṃ bāhaye pravṛttimātanotīti viplutaiva saṃsārātmikā ca |
SA15n1256:377: sa ca niyamo yathā darśanād vastupratibandhakṛtaḥ,
SA15n1256:378: tathā vikalpaviśeṣādapi pāramparyeṇa vastuprativastupratibandhakṛta ityadarśane'pi adhyavasāyāt pravṛttiryujyata iti nānumānamanavasthitam |
SA15n1256:387: tato yadyapi tattvena nāropo nāma kasyacit |
SA15n1256:390: bhrama eva hi saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ tattvasaṃsthitiḥ ||
SA15n1256:394: bhavaḥ śamo vā ka iheti kathyatām ||
SA15n1256:401: nirvāṇaṃ ca bhavaścaiva dvayameva na vidyate |
SA15n1256:404: yadapyuktaṃ vikalpasyāviṣayaśca bāhyam grahaṇaṃ cāsya śabdena saṃyojyeti vikalpatvamapi duryojam,
SA15n1256:405: ātmani ca śabdayojanā nāstīti vikalpo nāma nāstyeva,
SA15n1256:408: ihāgniratretyadhyavasāyo yathā kāyikīṃ vṛttiṃ prasūte tathāgnirmayā pratīyata iti vācikīmapi prasūte,
SA15n1256:410: evaṃ ca sati yathā vikalpenāyamartho gṛhīta iti niścayaḥ,
SA15n1256:415: na śabdaiḥ saṃsargaḥ kvacidapi bahirvā manasi vā-
SA15n1256:418: rvidhatte tau bāhye vacasi ca vikalpasthitirataḥ ||
SA15n1256:419: abhāne pratibhāne vā na cāropo'pi kasyacit |
SA15n1256:423: saṅketaḥ kṛta ityāsthā tādṛk śabdaśrutau punaḥ |
SA15n1256:426: tasmād vastu vā ghaṭapaṭādi sandigdhavastu vā sādhakabādhakātikrāntam,
SA15n1256:430: tasmādadhyavasāyasyākāraviśeṣayogādagṛhīte'pi pravartanayogyatā nāma yo dharmastayā bāhyādhyavasāyayorgrāhyagrāhakabhāvaścet saṃvṛttyā duṣpariharaḥ,
SA15n1256:431: tadā viṣayiviṣayabhāvo'pi labdha ityadhyavasāyamātreṇa viṣayaviṣayitvamuktamiti yuktam |
SA15n1256:434: etena yaduktam kathamavasīyamānastayātmārtho na prakāśyata ityādi,
SA15n1256:441: na caikākārollekhino vikalpasyākārāntare pravartanaśaktiranubhavaviṣaya iti kutaḥ śabdapramāṇāntarānapekṣeti yuktam |
SA15n1256:444: yathā ca bāhye sati kvacid bhramavyavasthā tathāntarnaye'pi sarvatra |
SA15n1256:445: kevalaṃ bahirmukhapravṛtyapekṣayā kriyamāṇo nātmani kaścid bhrama ityuktaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1256:449: vikalpikaiva na syāditi tu svarūpāpekṣayā siddhasādhanam |
SA15n1256:451: tasmādaśeṣagovyaktisādhāraṇena gotvena gobuddhiralīkena sābhilāpena viplavāt prakhyātīti tathā prakhyānamasyā gavāvasāya ityeṣṭavyamityapi neṣṭavyameva,
SA15n1256:453: na hi vikalpabuddhāvalīkākārasphuraṇameva bāhyasyādhyabasāya iti kācidarthasaṅgatiḥ,
SA15n1256:457: apratibhāsamānasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya bhrāntyāvasāyāditi tu na budhyāmahe |
SA15n1256:475: tadevamapratibhāsino'pi vipakṣādadhyavasāyamātrasiddhādeva vyāvṛtto doṣatrayanirmuktaḥ prakāśamānatātmako heturyāvatprakāśāvadhijñānātmakacitrākāracakrasyaikatvaṃ sādhayatyeva ||
SA15n1256:489: tannāstu sādhyo dṛṣṭānto na ca śaṅkāviparyaye |
SA15n1256:493: sthaulyenāpyaṇuśo na hi kvacididaṃ svapne'pi nirbhāsanam |
SA15n1256:505: sa hi nīlādiko'rtho jaḍo vijñānāntarātmālīkasvabhāvo vā svīkartavyaḥ |
SA15n1256:507: tathā hi jñānasya prakāśakatvaṃ nāma kiṃ vidyamānatvaṃ vyāpārāveśo vā |
SA15n1256:512: atha jñānatve sati vidyamānatvamiti saviśeṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇamucyate |
SA15n1256:514: yena sattāmātreṇa samasamayaṃ sphuratorvijñānanīlādyoḥ pratijñāmātrādekasya jaḍatvālīkatvabādhyatvāprakāśatvādi vyavasthāpyate |
SA15n1256:515: atha dvitīyastadā sa kiṃ vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣasyātmā jñānāntaram,
SA15n1256:518: dvitīyapakṣe jñānāntaraṃ yadyanyaviṣayam arthasya na kiñcit |
SA15n1256:521: tṛtīye punaḥ saṅkalpe nīlādikaṃ kṛtameva syāt,
SA15n1256:526: caturthe tu vikalpe arthāntare kṛte nīlādikaṃ tadavasthameva |
SA15n1256:529: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iva jñānajñeyayorapi svābhāviko grāhyagrāhakabhāvo vaktavyaḥ,
SA15n1256:530: pramāṇasiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvavad grāhyagrāhakasvarūpayoradyāpi nirvaktumaśakyatvāditi kva nīlādivārtāpi yadbhedasiddhipratyāśā pratyakṣataḥ sampadyate ||
SA15n1256:533: tacca yadi pratyākāraṃ bhinnaṃ tadā sarveṣāṃ svasvarūpanimagnatvāccitraprakāśapraṇāśaprasaṅga ityuktam |
SA15n1256:543: ata eva svasaṃvedanapratyakṣādanumānācca ekatvasiddhau na pratyakṣāntaram |
SA15n1256:556: yadā punarākāracakrameva prameyam svasaṃvedanaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tadā tenaiva nīlādīnāṃ svabhāvabhūtenākhaṇḍātmanā ekīkṛtānāṃ kathamapramādī bhedamācakṣīta |
SA15n1256:558: tathāpi kathaṃ bhedastasmād yathordhvamindriyapratyakṣataḥ kṣaṇabhede pratīte'pyavidyāvaśādekatvādhyavasāyaḥ tathā tiryaksvasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇākārābhede'dhigate'pyavidyāvaśādeva bhedāvasāyaḥ ||
SA15n1256:559: yadyevaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsato vijñānākāracakravad vyāpto'pi na bhidyeteti cet |
SA15n1256:561: buddhyākārakadambake tūktakrameṇa svasaṃvedanādisiddhaikatve'nekatvasya pratyākhyānād bādhakāvatāra eva nāsti |
SA15n1256:562: tasmād vijñānatve satīti hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ kartavyam yena bāhyasyaiva bhedaḥ sidhyati ||
SA15n1256:563: nanu yadi vijñānātmakaṃ vicitrākāracakramekaṃ tadā nīlākāra eva pītādyākāravṛndaṃ praviśet |
SA15n1256:571: tato'pi viparyayasya bhedasya siddheḥ prasaṅgo'pyasaṅgataḥ ityadvaitameva |
SA15n1256:572: kiṃ ca evaṃ sthūlanīlādyākāro'pi paramāṇumātre praviśedityapratibhāsaṃjagadāpadyeta |
SA15n1256:576: tathā kṛtakatvasyānityatvavastutvādibhirabhede kṛtakatvamevānityatvameva vā syādityapi prasaṅgo vaktavya āpadyeta,
SA15n1256:580: tadevaṃ bāhyaṃ na naśyati bhidāṇutayāpi sattvā-
SA15n1256:588: buddheḥ svavittiniṣṭhāyāḥ yaḥ parastasya kā gatiḥ ||
SA15n1256:592: neṣṭaṃ tadapi cet tarhi kvāṇvantarbhidi bhāsanam |
SA15n1256:593: na parīkṣākṣamaṃ cāṇuḥ kutastasya tadā bhidā ||
SA15n1256:606: vastuvyavasthā śaraṇaṃ kiṃ tu mānena saṅgatam ||
SA15n1256:608: yasya rāśiranekaṃ syānnāpi vastu ca kiñcina ||
